snippet.title: DOLLMAKER - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You wake up in an enormous room full of toys, in front of a misterious doll who's lacking an eye. Soon, you discover that she's your adversary in a macabre game, where you'll have to demonstrate your doll-building skills to recover that part of yourself that you are missing. Just One Button.

Try out the game!
Itch.io: https://mrwhitenoiz.itch.io/dollmaker
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/dollmakergame/923360

#indiegame #gamedev #gamedevelopment #dolls #games #unity #unity3d #trailer #indiegamedev
